data.text: @kelsalohop I’m sorry you are going through this but thank you for sharing with us. Happy birthday 🎂🎁🎉 and many more happy and healthy ones. I don’t think we understand fully how the disease is spread but you did everything possible to prevent. #NoShameZone
@kelsalohop Sorry you got it, and I hope you only have a mild case. Happy birthday anyway. Btw, you’ll love the beach house

Maybe if I, having taken all these precautions, STILL GOT FREAKING COVID while NYC numbers are “low” it might be worth reconsidering the end of the mask mandate and indoor vaccination requirements? @NYCMayor
